original_text:
how much more those who dwell in houses of clay,
    whose foundation is in the dust,
    who are crushed like the moth.
korean_text: 하물며 흙 집에 살며 티끌로 터를 삼고 하루살이 앞에서라도 무너질 자이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: how much more those who dwell in houses of clay
whose foundation is in the dust
who are crushed like the moth
